programme.title: Live: WWE Friday Night SmackDown
programme.desc: The Superstars of World Wrestling Entertainment display their skills and athleticism in weekly episodic programming, as scores are settled and enduring rivalries play out in the ring.

programme.title: Resident Alien
programme.desc: Harry and Asta attend an alien convention, featuring a behind-the-scenes look.

programme.title: Fantastic Beasts: The Crimes of Grindelwald
programme.desc: The second installment of the Fantastic Beasts series featuring the adventures of Magizoologist Newt Scamander.

programme.title: Fantastic Beasts: The Secrets of Dumbledore
programme.desc: Professor Albus Dumbledore must assist Newt Scamander and his partners as Grindelwald begins to lead an army to eliminate all Muggles.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
programme.desc: A summer has passed since Harry's encounter with the Dark Lord. With the wizard community in peril the future of magic may depend on Harry and a secret society known as The Order of the Phoenix.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
programme.desc: While Death Eaters emboldened by the return of Lord Voldemort wreak havoc in both the Muggle and Wizarding worlds, Harry suspects new dangers lie within Hogwarts.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows: Part 1
programme.desc: In the first part of the seventh and final adventure, Harry, Ron and Hermione set out on their perilous mission to destroy the secret to Voldemort's immortality and destruction: the Horcruxes.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows: Part 2
programme.desc: Making their final stand upon the ramparts of Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry, Harry Potter, Ron and Hermione face their greatest foe and make the ultimate sacrifice on their journey.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows: Part 1
programme.desc: In the first part of the seventh and final adventure, Harry, Ron and Hermione set out on their perilous mission to destroy the secret to Voldemort's immortality and destruction: the Horcruxes.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows: Part 2
programme.desc: Making their final stand upon the ramparts of Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry, Harry Potter, Ron and Hermione face their greatest foe and make the ultimate sacrifice on their journey.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The creator of a dating app is accused of using it to rape women; Velasco's experience as an SVU detective is put on trial.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Detectives try to identify a girl who is so traumatized after being raped that she cannot tell them her name.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Benson and Stabler help a repeat rape victim (Jennifer Love Hewitt) stand up to her attacker; the investigation leads Benson to Los Angeles, where she meets a detective (Skeet Ulrich) with information that could help the victim get justice.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A teenage girl's death in a hit-and-run accident leads Benson and Stabler to a human trafficking ring; Cragen becomes frustrated by his crumbling precinct.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When Benson and Stabler investigate a young woman's rape and murder, the case puts them in the line of fire and exposes a larger mystery that includes more victims.

programme.title: Resident Alien
programme.desc: Harry the alien is back on Earth and doesn't remember who he is, and only Asta can keep him safe.

programme.title: Resident Alien
programme.desc: Harry has a plan to save Asta and himself but he must first attend the Sheriff's poker game.

programme.title: Resident Alien
programme.desc: Harry meets a woman unlike any other and realizes that she is the key to his new mission.

programme.title: Resident Alien
programme.desc: Asta is concerned Harry is building another bomb and hopes to find out when they go camping on the reservation.

programme.title: Live: Premier League Mornings
programme.desc: Stateside Premier League fan festival that includes a turf pitch, the Premier League trophy, club mascots, special guests, contests, and more.

programme.title: Live: Premier League Soccer
programme.desc: Nottingham Forest and Chelsea meet in a crucial Premier League finale. Forest would overtake the Blues with a win, securing at least a Europa League berth. Chelsea faces Spanish side Real Betis in the UEFA Conference League final on May 28 in Poland.

programme.title: Live: Premier League Goal Zone
programme.desc: The best moments from the weekend in Premier League action.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: As the investigation into a sex-for-housing scheme expands, Benson's loyalty to Garland is tested; Rollins and Carisi try to keep their witnesses on board when a powerful congressman is identified as a suspect.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The search for a missing witness leads Fin and Kat down a dangerous path; Chief McGrath puts pressure on Garland and Benson to get a conviction.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The SVU searches for a serial rapist who preys on mothers with young children; Benson and Fin struggle under the tightened reins of Chief McGrath.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The creator of a dating app is accused of using it to rape women; Velasco's experience as an SVU detective is put on trial.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Velasco asks Benson for help finding three girls who were trafficked from his hometown to New York City.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Carisi must tread carefully when Maxwell's husband becomes a person of interest in an SVU investigation; Benson sends Velasco to take an old friend into custody.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: To identify a woman's attacker, the SVU must track down a mysterious suspect targeting tourists staying in hostels.
